EmailTemplate.subject: Special Announcement - Wyco Sure Speed and 994 Motor Shaft Assembly
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Web Version
Wyco Sure Speed and 994 Motor Shaft Assembly | January 6, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
Wyco Sure Speed and 994 Motor Shaft Assembly
Wyco has received Sure Speed and 994 motor returns exhibiting fractured motor shell ribs adjacent to the threaded connector due to improper field assembly. The letter at the link below explains the details of this issue and how this problem can be avoided. Please feel free to share the letter with your customers. > Download - Wyco Motor Shaft Assembly Letter
For addition help please contact Wyco customer service at 262-639-6770.
Stay Connected
As always, we welcome your input. Please feel free to contact us with any comments or suggestions you may have.
